meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gusty.
meanings.sent1: The gustiness of the wind made the trees sway.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the gustiness of the breeze on my face.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined by the unexpected gustiness of the weather.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a gustiness that filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The gustiness of his emotions was evident in his passionate speech.

meanings.definition: A sudden, strong burst of wind.
meanings.sent1: The sudden gustiness almost blew off my hat.
meanings.sent2: We had to hold onto our hats due to the gustiness of the storm.
meanings.sent3: The gustiness caught us by surprise during our outdoor concert.
meanings.sent4: The gustiness of the storm was like nature's powerful exhale.
meanings.sent5: The gustiness of the wind carried the scent of fresh rain to us.
